title: Macron's tighter asylum rules worry own party
text:
Macron's tighter asylum rules worry own party 1:39pm EST - 01:47 
French President Emmanuel Macron has proposed tougher immigration and asylum laws despite strident criticism from rights groups. That has tested his so-far united parliamentary majority. Reuters Julie Carriat reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
French President Emmanuel Macron has proposed tougher immigration and asylum laws despite strident criticism from rights groups. That has tested his so-far united parliamentary majority.
